title: Why a Kenyan road sign has become a burning issue
description: How Kenya's union leader Francis Atwoli is dividing opinion after a street was named after him.

title: Female genital mutilation (FGM): 'I had it, but my daughters won't'
description: Two mothers subjected to FGM tell how they will not let their daughters suffer the same.

title: Week in pictures: 19 - 25 June 2021
description: A selection of powerful images taken around the world this week.

title: Ros Atkins On…Why the Olympics is going ahead
description: Ros Atkins examines the decision to hold the Tokyo Olympics during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Russia's Euro 2020 Covid dilemma
description: Russia is hosting Euro 2020 matches but the alarm is being sounded about a new wave of coronavirus.

title: Bioluminescence: Photographer's five-year wait to capture blue sea glow
description: Gareth Mon Jones says he went to the beach 15 nights in a row to find a bioluminescence display.

title: The builders with the secret to work-life balance
description: A forklift driver can't work from home, but there are other ways the industry can offer more flexibility.

title: 'We are ready for a battle ... the gloves are off' - Wales face Denmark in last 16
description: The "gloves are off" for Wales as they prepare to face Denmark in their Euro 2020 last-16 tie in Amsterdam on Saturday.

title: George Floyd murder: Derek Chauvin sentenced to over 22 years
description: Derek Chauvin was convicted last month of killing Mr Floyd, whose death sparked global protests.

title: Ely pub's 'quirky' tankard investigated by council
description: The giant drinking vessel on the side of a pub is described as "a monstrosity" on social media.

title: UFO Pentagon report: Do Americans believe something's out there?
description: A highly anticipated US government report on UFOs has been released. Is the truth out there?

title: Katty Kay: How 100 days turned into five years of fun
description: Katty Kay leaves the BBC after nearly three decades of service, including five years on Beyond 100 Days.

title: The students calling out China on Australia's campuses
description: Students in Australia speaking out against the Chinese state are facing threats and intimidation.

title: Euro 2020: Lawro takes on BBC Radio 5 Live pundits, presenters and commentators to predict the last-16 matches
description: BBC Sport's football expert Mark Lawrenson takes on BBC Radio 5 Live pundits, presenters and commentators to make his predictions for the last-16 ties at Euro 2020.

title: Miami building collapse: What happened, and how quickly?
description: Maps, images and graphics of what we know about a 12-storey residential building's collapse north of Miami.

title: Euro 2020: Phil Foden explains England's preparations for penalties
description: England's Phil Foden explains how the players are preparing for the possibility of a penalty shootout with Germany in the last 16 of Euro 2020.

title: Euro 2020: Wales to be ruthless against neutrals' favourites Denmark
description: Wales were loved at Euro 2016 but on Saturday they will be ruthless against Denmark, the neutrals' heroes of Euro 2020.

title: Covid: Sydney city centre and Bondi beach to enter lockdown
description: Central areas of Australia's largest city will go into a week-long lockdown to contain a rise in cases.

title: Euro 2020: Reviewing the boots worn by Griezmann, Sterling, Pogba & Ronaldo
description: Football boots expert JayMike dials in from Denmark to talk BBC Sport's Liam Loftus through the football boots making their mark at Euro 2020.

title: Miami building collapse: Rescuers listen for signs of life in rubble
description: Rescuers search for survivors with 99 unaccounted for after the collapse of the 12-storey complex.

title: The Papers: Green list holiday 'joy' and 'confusion'
description: Friday's papers react to the news that more countries are being added to the UK's green travel list.

title: Biden backs bumper economic stimulus bill - with big caveat
description: The president says he will only sign it if Democrats can pass a separate, far bigger budget bill.

title: Covid: Green list expansion not enough, say travel bosses
description: Sixteen places - including Ibiza - will join the green list from Wednesday, but industry leaders want more.

title: Gibraltar votes to ease tough abortion laws
description: Referendum results show support for lifting the rules, which are some of the harshest in Europe.

title: Covid-19: NHS Test and Trace weaknesses remain, says watchdog
description: National Audit Office says winter test results took too long in England and too many consultants are used.

title: A&Es 'overwhelmed' by children with mild winter viruses, doctors warn
description: Winter viruses are flourishing as more people mix, and a doctor's chief says A&Es are struggling to cope.
